DataSource.Query: SELECT quotations.value_date, customers.customer_name, quotations.expected_delivery_date, quotations.terms, items.item_name, quotation_details.quantity, units.unit_code, quotation_details.price, quotation_details.shipping_charge, CASE WHEN orders.order_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Ordered' WHEN finance.get_date(quotations.office_id) > quotations.expected_delivery_date THEN 'Expired' ELSE 'Pending' END AS quatation_status FROM sales.quotations JOIN inventory.customers ON quotations.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN sales.quotation_details ON quotations.quotation_id = quotation_details.quotation_id JOIN inventory.items ON quotation_details.item_id = items.item_id JOIN inventory.units ON quotation_details.unit_id = units.unit_id LEFT JOIN sales.orders ON quotations.quotation_id = orders.quotation_id WHERE quotations.office_id = @OfficeId AND quotations.value_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date;
